name: Edgar Tool
description: Edgar Tool, also known asTooLina, is a character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Edgar Tool is a large man that has fully copiedLina Malina's appearance, apart from her eyes and eyebrows. He instead has brown eyes and pink eyebrows. As he tries to cosplay Lina's long-lost twin, he is wearing a pair of rimless round glasses, and has several golden piercings adorning his head, of which are: a circular barbell septum piercing, a left nose ring, a pair of cross earrings and various other ear piercings. Around his neck he wears a silver choker that is decorated with red gemstones, and two golden...
